game.name: Boom Buddies
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Boom Buddies is a fixed-position bullet hell survival game where animal heroes face endless enemy waves, upgrade weapons through card choices, unlock new characters, and compete on global leaderboards.
